options.content:
# Kyverno
A Kubernetes-native policy management engine

#### About this dashboard

This dashboard represents generic insights that can be extracted from a cluster with Kyverno running.

#### For more details around the metrics

Checkout the [official docs of Kyverno metrics](https://kyverno.io/docs/monitoring/)

panels.title: Active Policies running in background mode
Average Rule Execution Latency Over Time
Average Policy Execution Latency Over Time
Avg - Admission Review Duration Over Time (by operation)
Avg - Admission Review Duration Over Time (by resource kind)
Policy Changes Over Time (by change type)
Policy Changes Over Time (by policy type)
